lead_paragraph: From The Albany Evening Journal. The following is the Apportionment by the State Superintendent of the sum of $800,000, directed to be raised on the Real and Personal Property of the State by the "Act for the Establishment of Free Schools throughout the State," passed in April last;

headline.main: Satte Tax for the Support of Schools.
